TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer cells are found in both kidneys when the disease is first diagnosed. Each kidney is staged separately as I, II, III, or IV.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage V Wilms tumor"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "tumor de Wilms en estadio V"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: tumor de Wilms en estadio V

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cuando recién se diagnostica la enfermedad, las células cancerosas se encuentran en ambos riñones. Cada riñón se estadifica por separado en estadio I, II, III o IV.
